title: But what if I want a faster horse?
author: saeedesmaili
aiHeadline: But what if I really, really want a faster horse? Because, you know, cars are just overrated.

title: Leaked data reveals Israeli government campaign to remove pro-Palestine posts
author: jbegley
aiHeadline: Leaked data shows Israeli government is really good at deleting things—like pro-Palestine posts and, uh, maybe their own history?

title: Live Map of the London Underground
author: LourensT
aiHeadline: Live map of the London Underground: because getting lost in a giant rat maze is fun, right?

title: Pentagon to terminate $5.1B in IT contracts with Accenture, Deloitte
author: oldprogrammer2
aiHeadline: Pentagon says 'Thanks, but no thanks' to Accenture and Deloitte—because even the government knows when you're getting scammed.

title: Default styles for h1 elements are changing
author: soheilpro
aiHeadline: Default styles for h1 elements are changing: because nothing says 'I'm a headline' like a font size that's just a tiny bit bigger.
